categories.name: Answer Quality
categories.description: Evaluate how well responses answer questions and stay grounded in context

subMetrics.name: Answer Relevancy
subMetrics.description: Measures how relevant the answer is to the given question

subMetrics.name: Faithfulness
subMetrics.description: Evaluates if the answer is grounded in the provided context

subMetrics.name: Hallucination Detection
subMetrics.description: Identifies when the model generates false or unsupported information

categories.name: Context Understanding
categories.description: Measure how well models comprehend and utilize provided context

subMetrics.name: Context Recall
subMetrics.description: Measures how well the model recalls information from the context

subMetrics.name: Factual Consistency
subMetrics.description: Evaluates consistency of facts between context and answer

categories.name: Similarity & Accuracy
categories.description: Compare outputs against expected responses using similarity measures

subMetrics.name: Exact Match
subMetrics.description: Checks if the answer exactly matches the expected response

subMetrics.name: BERTScore
subMetrics.description: Semantic similarity using BERT embeddings

subMetrics.name: Embedding Distance
subMetrics.description: Cosine similarity between answer and reference embeddings

categories.name: Language Quality
categories.description: Assess linguistic quality, fluency, and coherence of generated text

subMetrics.name: Fluency
subMetrics.description: Evaluates the natural flow and readability of the text

subMetrics.name: Coherence
subMetrics.description: Measures logical consistency and clarity of the response

subMetrics.name: Conciseness
subMetrics.description: Assesses if the answer is appropriately brief and to the point
